specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Crushed Crushed is a post-processing method that creates a creased or crumpled effect. It gives the fabric a naturally wrinkled texture, adding depth, visual interest, and a casual, vintage-inspired look.
specifications.Care Advice: Natural > Silk Silk can be damaged by sweat and other acidic substances. It may also fade if left in the sun for too long. Store it in a place without direct sunlight.
specifications.Care Instructions: Dry clean only Recommended Use Bridal
